author: dkhaywood
msg: further fix for the AggregatedOid stuff / xml-persistor

author: dkhaywood
msg: AdapterManagerDefault & OneToOneAssocationImpl together will now create an AggregatedOid if the otoa has an AggregatedFacet; XmlPersistenceMechanismInstaller now defines an XmlAdapterManager t o effectively reinstate old behaviour (since the XMLOS does not support AggregatedOids yet); AggregatedOid#getParentOid() returns Oid instead of just Object; generalized NakedObjectsSpecification#getObjectActions() to take a varargs of NakedObjectActionType; tidy up to dndviewer's OptionFactory (same overall functionality/design) to use this NOS#getOA() method; removed commented-out reference to headless-applib in application archetype for dom project.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Started using Tag objects to convert inline tags.
